title: Good Omens
summary: This book is a hilarious take on the apocalypse.

reviews.body: I loved this book! So funny and cleverly written.

title: Atomic Habits
summary: This book is all about building good habits and breaking bad ones.

reviews.body: This book was life-changing. Highly recommend!

title: The Da Vinci Code
summary: This book is a mystery thriller that follows symbologist Robert Langdon and cryptologist Sophie Neveu as they investigate a murder in the Louvre Museum in Paris.

reviews.body: Great read! I couldn't put this book down.

title: The Hunger Games
summary: In a future North America, where the rulers of Panem maintain control through an annual televised survival competition pitting young people from each of the twelve districts against one another, sixteen-year-old Katniss's skills are put to the test when she voluntarily takes her younger sister's place.

reviews.body: This book is amazing! The characters are well-developed and the plot is gripping. Highly recommend.

title: A Burning
summary: Jivan is a Muslim girl from the slums, determined to move up in life, who is accused of executing a terrorist attack on a train because of a careless comment on Facebook. PT Sir is an opportunistic gym teacher who hitches his aspirations to a right-wing political party, and finds that his own ascent becomes linked to Jivan's fall. Lovely--an irresistible outcast whose exuberant voice and dreams of glory fill the novel with warmth and hope and humor--has the alibi that can set Jivan free, but it will cost her everything she holds dear.

reviews.body: This is a beautifully written and thought-provoking book. Highly recommend.

title: Between the World and Me
summary: This book is written as a letter to the author's teenage son about the feelings, symbolism, and realities associated with being Black in the United States.

reviews.body: This book is a must-read for anyone who wants to understand the experience of Black Americans.

title: Introduction to Algorithms
summary: This book provides a comprehensive introduction to the modern study of computer algorithms.

reviews.body: This is a great reference book for anyone studying computer science.

title: Operating System Concepts
summary: This book provides a comprehensive introduction to the fundamental concepts of operating systems.

reviews.body: This book is an excellent resource for anyone interested in learning about operating systems.
